籤詩版本二:
Ngaphandle kwethiyori, awukho umndeni.Isilima samanzi sifana nembali ewile.
Uma ucela umusa wakho udinga ukukwazi, kodwa ekugcineni uzobona ukuthi yonke into isenkingeni.
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lokuvaleka kwe-Dao yomuntu oyisiwula.
Hlala unomphela kukho konke futhi ulinde isikhathi.
解曰: Ungasho okulungile noma okungalungile. Kumele uqaphele. Inhliziyo elungile. Ukuze ugweme inhlekelele.
籤詩故事一:
◇Yin Jiao uhlangana nothisha wakhe
U-Yin Jiao wayeyindodana yeNkosi uZhou yoBukhosi BamaShang, futhi wayekhulekela u-Guang Chengzi njengothisha wakhe. Ngemva kweminyaka emithathu, wafunda imilingo, wathi ehla entabeni wafunga eGuangchengzi ukuthi wayengeke ayisize inkosi uZhou ekwenzeni izinto ezimbi futhi wayeyocela ukukhosela eNkosini uWen.
Endleleni wagqugquzelwa ukuthi aye ekhaya ayosiza iNkosi uZhou. Inkosi yahamba yayomncenga, futhi umninikhaya nomfundi balwa. Kamuva, u-Jiang Ziya kanye ne-Taoist Ran Deng bavalelisa i-Yin Jiao phakathi kwezintaba ezimbili futhi bahlatshwa ngefosholo bafa nguGuang Chengzi. Ephendula isifungo yena (Yin Jiao) asifunga.
聖意: Angikhululeki ekhaya ngsengcupheni ngicela imali kunzima ukuhwebelana kunzima ukuganwa ngcela izibusiso abantu bavimbe amasimu miningi imiswenya miningi izilwane, ziningi izinhlekelele, ngifuna abantu, ngisenkingeni, ngisenkingeni, ngisenkingeni, ngisenkingeni, nginenkinga, enkingeni.
